==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a [[pestle]].

Also borrowed phonetically as a simplification of {{zh-l|*乾}} and {{zh-l|*幹}}.

===Etymology 1===
{{zh-see|乾||dry}}

===Etymology 2===
{{zh-see|幹||to do, to work}}

===Etymology 3===
{{zh-forms}}

Sino-Tibetan. Cognate with {{och-l|扞|to shield; to protect}}, {{och-l|閈|gate}}. Compare {{cog|bo|འགལ||to go against, to violate, to contradict}}, {{cog|my|ကာ||shield; to shield; to block}}.

|m=gān
|c=gon1
|h=pfs=kôn
|md=găng
|mn=kan
|w=1koe
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,a,v,adv
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} a [[shield]]
# {{†}} to [[request]], to [[ask]]
# {{†}} to [[offend]], to [[encroach]] on
# {{†}} to [[interfere]], to [[intervene]]
# to [[concern]]; to be implicated in; [[implication]]
#* {{zh-x|這 事 與 我 無 '''干'''{gān}。|It has nothing '''to do''' with me.}}
# {{†}} [[bank]]; edge of water bodies
#* {{zh-l|江干}}
